about_the_game:
Kick back in party mode! This doesn't add a lot, but it definitely serves as more of a "developer tip jar." If you liked Other Submarine and wanted to support the developer, you can buy this and kick back for some good times.

Leaving the party sub through the ladder will show the full ending to escaping the Other Submarine.
detailed_description:
Kick back in party mode! This doesn't add a lot, but it definitely serves as more of a "developer tip jar." If you liked Other Submarine and wanted to support the developer, you can buy this and kick back for some good times.

Leaving the party sub through the ladder will show the full ending to escaping the Other Submarine.
name: Other Submarine : Party Sub

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core processor, 2.7 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 700 Series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2050 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 Series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2050 MB available space

short_description: Kick back in party mode! This doesn't add a lot, but it definitely serves as more of a "developer tip jar." If you liked Other Submarine and wanted to support the developer, you can buy this and kick back for some good times. Leaving the party sub through the ladder will show the full ending to escaping the Other Submarine.
